hooks.command: ruff check src/ tests/ --fix --quiet 2>/dev/null; ruff format src/ tests/ --quiet 2>/dev/null
python scripts/validate_doc_references.py 2>/dev/null || echo 'Document reference check failed (non-blocking)'
ruff check src/ tests/ --fix --quiet 2>&1 | head -10; ruff format src/ tests/ --quiet 2>&1 | head -10

hooks.description: Pre-commit: Changed files only + coverage summary
hooks.command: git diff --name-only --cached | grep -E '\.py$' | xargs -r pytest --cov=src --cov-report=term-missing:skip-covered -q --tb=line 2>&1 | grep -E '^(PASSED|FAILED|ERROR|coverage:)' | head -30 || echo 'Tests failed or no Python files changed'

hooks.description: Warn if session on main branch
hooks.command: git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null | grep -qx main && echo 'Session ended on main branch - ensure commits are reviewed' || exit 0
